jobDescription: This internship is ideal for someone with a quantitative background, Microsoft Excel skills, and an interest in the healthcare industry. The role offers learning through exposure to recommendations for medical procedures and pharmaceutical treatments, cost and efficacy data, and the impact of physician decision-making on health outcomes and expenditure.The ideal candidate will possess strong attention to detail, an ability to quickly learn new tools and processes, intellectual curiosity, and the desire to do anything to help the team.Tasks: Read Grand Rounds patient case files featuring expert second opinions written by physicians who rank at the very top of their respective fieldsExtract key details from written second opinions and classify them according to several structured data parameters (e.g. type of procedure or pharmaceutical treatment involved) to enable broad population analysisUpdate case database with summary statisticsPresent findings on case distribution and metric performanceQualifications:
